room_title: Escape room "Apartment 408" by Crimson Key in San Jose
review: My friend and I played Apartment 408 last night. Great set design, a nice mix of tech and non-tech puzzles. The room is beatable with just 2 people and I appreciate that they do private bookings. We'll be back to try their other room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment 408" by Crimson Key in San Jose
review: We recently completed Apartment 408 with 2 people and had a blast. It was a well designed room with some unique and interesting puzzles. You can tell a lot of time was put into the design and details of the room. We can wait to come back and try the classroom themed one!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment 408" by Crimson Key in San Jose
review: Had an amazing time doing 'Apartment 408' with just 2 people (made it out in time!). The puzzles and the plot were very clever and the atmosphere is set so well! I really recommend doing this one!After we finished we had a nice chat with the owner who told us about some other locations to check out, which are definitely up our alley as well. Thanks again!
